name: Fabric Scoop Flat Race Saddle - Unisex
description: Flexibility, comfort, and an ergonomic shape to fit your riding style. The flat profile is ideal for riders who want the most aerodynamic position possible. A thin layer of padding covers an already flexible nylon shell, and the upper is bonded to the shell with vacuum bonding. It allows the saddle to keeps its performance over time and it's easy to clean! Comfort, performance and simplicity. Ride on.Flat profile suits riders who want a more aerodynamic position.Flexible nylon fiber matrix base ensures comfort.Hollow titanium-alloy rails are light and stiff.Lightweight PU foam upper provides the right amount of cushion.Microfibre cover is waterproof.Vacuum bonded construction is comfortable, easy to clean and durable.
